Who is the CEO of the company?: Shruti Gupta is the CEO of the company.
What is their vacation policy?: The Company offers paid vacation time to all full-time regular employees. Employees must request vacation from their Manager as far in advance as possible, but at least a certain number of days in advance. Vacation must be taken in increments of at least a certain number of hours or days. The Company will generally grant vacation requests when possible, taking business needs into consideration. When multiple employees request the same time off, their length of employment or seniority may determine priority in scheduling. Employees may also use accrued but unused vacation time if additional time off is needed, and the Company may grant additional unpaid time off on a case-by-case basis. Vacation can also be used during a leave of absence, if permissible by law. The Company may also require employees to use any unused vacation during disability or family medical leave. Sick time can also be used for dental or doctor visits or to care for immediate family members who are sick. However, unused sick days cannot be converted into cash. Sick time accumulation is capped at a certain number of days per year.
What is the termination policy?: The termination policy states that employees may be disciplined or terminated for violating company policies or procedures. The company may also engage in progressive discipline, but this does not guarantee continued employment. The specific terms of employment, including termination procedures, are governed by the laws of the state in which the employee is employed.
